ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The SciTrader demo shows a multi-chart pane, interactive MVVM demo rendering Candlestick, Mountain (Area), Line and Column charts with user-selectable chart type, Data source (e.g. INDU, EUR.USD), Timeframe (Daily, Hourly) and interactivity modifiers for medium to large datasets (up to 100,000 OHLC values). SciTrader showcases the interactivity of SCICHART via user-selectable ChartModifiers. Select an option and you can zoom, pan, scale the X & Y axis, draw a zoom region and interrogate data values on mouse over.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The SciTrader demo shows a multi-chart pane, interactive MVVM demo rendering Candlestick, Mountain (Area), Line and Column charts with user-selectable chart type, Data source, Timeframe and interactivity modifiers for medium to large datasets (up to 100,000 OHLC values).
[b][i]SciTrader showcases the interactivity of SCICHART via user-selectable ChartModifiers. Select an option and you can:[/i][/b]
- Zoom the chart by dragging - Pan the chart by dragging - Zoom using the Mousewheel - Zoom using the mousewheel - Scale the chart by dragging X or Y Axes - Use the RolloverModifier to interrogate data-point values
